mapper.select: SELECT g_no, g_id, g_password, g_l_grade as l_grade, g_name, g_tel, g_email, g_birth, g_join, g_point, g_memo FROM hairshop.guest where g_secession = false
SELECT g_no, g_id, g_l_grade as l_grade, g_name, g_tel, g_email, g_birth, g_join, g_point, g_memo FROM guest where g_name like CONCAT('%',#{gName},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hairshop.guest (g_id, g_password, g_l_grade, g_name, g_tel, g_email, g_birth, g_join, g_point, g_memo) VALUES(#{gId}, #{gPassword}, #{gLGrade.lGrade}, #{gName}, #{gTel}, #{gEmail}, #{gBirth}, #{gJoin}, 0, #{gMemo});
